description: {"blocks":[{"key":"e691i","text":"Here, we are providing an optimized, step-by-step clearing protocol that retains the signal generated by HCR v3.0 in whole mount Octopus vulgaris embryos, even in combination with immunohistochemistry. Please cite (Elagoz et al., 2022) if you use this protocol. ","type":"align-left","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":129,"length":16}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9inov","text":"","type":"align-left","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bnpmc","text":"For designing HCR v3.0 probe pairs, we have developed an automated tool called Easy_HCR which can be found at https://github.com/SeuntjensLab/Easy_HCR.","type":"align-left","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":110,"length":40}],"data":{}},{"key":"5lpsh","text":"","type":"align-left","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5stnk","text":"","type":"align-left","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"link","mutability":"","data":{"guid":"CEAF04EE8E4A11EC94500A58A9FEAC02","url":"https://github.com/SeuntjensLab/Easy_HCR"}}}}
guidelines: {"blocks":[{"key":"aq3go","text":"The bench, lids etc. were cleaned thoroughly with EtOH and RNase away. Work as RNase-free as possible during the duration of the experiment.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

DNA oPools from IDT (without 5’ mod): 50 pmol","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cq1m1","text":"Dissolved in 100 ul ultrapure water (or Tris pH 7.5). Final concentration is 0.5 pmol/ul. Aliquot per 10 ul and store at -20°C. We use 0.3 pmol = 0.6 ul per slide.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8nu81","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9pb9d","text":"Reagents and supplies","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":21}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"f36ad","text":"Heparin (Sigma cat H3393): powder stored at room T, aliquots are stored at 4°C.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"16fjc","text":"20x Sodium Chloride Sodium Citrate (SSC: Invitrogen) 1 L, stored at room T.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"95c2k","text":"10 % Tween 20 (Bio-Rad). Protect from light. Stored at Room T.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1fivj","text":"50x Denhardt’s solution (Aliquot and store at -20°C)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"37ee9","text":"Dextran sulfate (Sigma cat D8906): powder stored at 4°C, aliquots are stored at -20°C.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"f6s1b","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"abb2e","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1s4a0","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4rfup","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

status.info: We use this protocol and it’s working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"dvisc","text":"DAY 0","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":5}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"d48r1","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3uoes","text":"Fix tissue overnight in 4 % paraformaldehyde (PFA) in phosphate-buffered saline (PBS-DEPC) at 4°C.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1ouiv","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"93ipe","text":"DAY 1","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":5}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5a3h","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4sqks","text":"Wash with PBS-DEPC. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"7o8m","text":"Dechorionate the octopus embryos in PBST.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3ej6s","text":"Dehydrate embryos into methanol (MeOH) with a series of graded MeOH/PBST washes for 10 min on ice:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"c3e6u","text":"(a) 25% MeOH / 75% PBST","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5o8u7","text":"(b) 50% MeOH / 50% PBST","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7p6dd","text":"(c) 75% MeOH / 25% PBST","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"71t2k","text":"(d) 100% MeOH","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fqr9j","text":"(e) 100% MeOH.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"f8f7c","text":"Incubate embryos at -20 °C overnight (\u003e 16 h) or until use.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"41scp","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4r60d","text":"NOTE: Embryos can be stored for six months at -20 °C.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8g5s9","text":"DAY 2","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":5}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9gusg","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"eiu6v","text":"Transfer the required number of embryos for an experiment to a 0.5 ml Eppendorf tube. “Thaw” on ice and gradually move them to room temperature (approx. in half an hour).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1bvkh","text":"Rehydrate with a series of graded MeOH/PBST washes for 10 min each on ice:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8d1k4","text":"(a) 75% MeOH / 25% PBST","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1tgmr","text":"(b) 50% MeOH / 50% PBST","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1mllb","text":"(c) 25% MeOH / 75% PBST","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2juuk","text":"(d) 100% PBST","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4tsst","text":"(e) 100% PBST","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6m08q","text":"Immerse embryos in 10 ug/mL proteinase K solution for 15 min at room temperature (1,08 μl of proteinase K in 2 ml of PBS-DEPC (Proteinase K rec PCR grade, art. 3115887001, Roche)).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"aconv","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dkdd0","text":"NOTE: Proteinase K concentration and treatment time should be reoptimized for each batch of proteinase K, or for samples at a different developmental stage.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"43hok","text":"Wash embryos 2 x 5 min with PBST.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9h822","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"f401r","text":"Postfix with 4% PFA for 20 min at room temperature.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1sv0f","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"f5gig","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"gau0","text":"Wash embryos 3 x 5 min with PBST.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"8js4q","text":"Pre-warm oven and hybridization buffer to 37°C.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6nh1t","text":"Remove the buffer and pre-hybridize with 100 ul of probe hybridization buffer for 30 min at 37°C. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"10jlb","text":"Thaw probes on ice, spin down before using.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"evr2o","text":"Prepare probe solution by adding 0.4 pmol of each probe mixture to 100 ul of probe hybridization buffer at 37°C.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6baef","text":"Remove the pre-hybridization solution and add 100 ul of the probe solution and incubate embryos overnight (12–16 h) at 37°C (no shaker is used during this step). ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"57jo9","text":"DAY 3","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":5}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"boc4q","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"277v8","text":"Remove excess probes by washing embryos 4 x 15 min with 100 ul of probe wash buffer at 37°C","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bj59f","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ae4h0","text":"NOTE: Pre-warm the wash solution in the oven to 37°C before use.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"fhbhk","text":"Wash samples 2 x 5 min with 5 x SSCT at room temperature. (Thaw hairpins on ice in the dark and move the amplification buffer to room temp.)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":58,"length":82}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2pdc1","text":"Remove the solution and Pre-amplify embryos with 100 ul of amplification buffer for at least 30 min at room temperature.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9arn7","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"df9l8","text":"NOTE: Equilibrate amplification buffer to room temperature before use.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6l6b1","text":"Separately prepare 6 pmol of H1 and H2 in separate PCR tubes. Specifically, pipet 2 μl of each hairpin [3 μM stock (3 pmol for H1 and 3 pmol for H2) in hairpin storage buffer] in a separate PCR tube. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bvauv","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2b8ag","text":"In a PCR thermocycler: heat hairpins at 95 °C for 90s. Immediately put hairpins on ice for 5 minutes, and then leave hairpins at room temperature for 30 minutes IN THE DARK.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1r84p","text":"Prepare the hairpin solution by adding all snap-cooled hairpins to 100 ul of amplification buffer at room T. (Add equal amounts of amplification buffer to both hairpin 1 and 2 and then add hairpin 1 to hairpin 2)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"756j4","text":"Remove the pre-amplification solution and add the hairpin solution. Incubate the embryos/larvae overnight (12–16 h) in the dark at room temperature (no shaker is used during this step).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"dlkrg","text":"DAY 4","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":5}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bkvam","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"847g2","text":"Remove excess hairpins by washing with 100 uL of 5x SSCT at room temperature in the dark:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"94s45","text":"(a) 2 x 5 min","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9b352","text":"(b) 2 x 30 min","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dtkp5","text":"(c) 1 x 5 min","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"eq8hj","text":"(d) 1 x 2hrs with DAPI (1:2000)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3a32m","text":"(e) 1 x 5 mins","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"bnhs2","text":"Samples can be transferred to the Fructose-Glycerol clearing solution described in Dekkers et al., 2019 for at least 2 days.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"37c3v","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bkakf","text":"Fructose-Glycerol clearing solution was prepared by dissolving 29,72 grams of fructose in 33 ml of glycerol and 7 ml of distilled water on a magnetic stirrer. The solution can be stored at 4 °C for a month. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"74g63","text":"Incubate embryos with the primary antibody (1:1000 rabbit anti-phosphohistone H3 (Ser10) (Millipore 06-570) for the following 2 days after the HCR protocol. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4pibg","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"35jep","text":"IMPORTANT NOTE: When HCR is combined with IHC, the incubation in DAPI is skipped and the embryos are directly processed for IHC after the last excess hairpin removal wash. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"eok6k","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4ub5s","text":"IMPORTANT NOTE: The whole protocol of IHC is carried out at 4°C. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4umuc","text":"DAY 6","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":5}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5u9kg","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6t59f","text":"Wash embryos with 5xSSCT three times for 2 hours.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"bi68c","text":"Add the secondary antibody donkey anti-rabbit Alexa 488 (Life Technologies) at a final concentration of 1:300 diluted in antibody diluent (Roche) and incubate O/N. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"a49s5","text":"DAY 7","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":5}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"c8n2i","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"38g1j","text":"Wash with 5xSSCT twice for 2 hours.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"dq8et","text":"Incubate embryos in 1:2000 DAPI in 5xSSCT for 2 hours followed by 5xSSCT wash for 5 minutes.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"gs8n","text":" Incubate embryos in Fructose-Glycerol clearing as described above before imaging. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"co30m","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

title: Hybridization Chain Reaction combined with Immunohistochemistry for Whole-Mount Embryos

warning: {"blocks":[{"key":"58c7f","text":"Formamide is toxic substance so make sure to take the appropriate measures. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
